title: Devil's Own (Clan MacAlpin #2)
description: Storyline: Devil's Own (Clan MacAlpin #2) \n After surviving slavery, Aiden MacAlpin has nothing but thoughts of vengeance. When his tutor Elspeth learns a secret to his past, it thrusts them both into a game of passion and deception that neither may survive.\n
author: Veronica Wolff
